short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get your own cute emoji pets to explore the internet with you!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**NOTE: This extension works on any site except the Chrome web store and specialized chrome pages such as the new tab page. To get an emoji, click on the smiley icon next to the address bar.**

Now with up to 100 emojis! You can now drag and drop them as well.

Get an cute little emoji pet to follow you as you explore the internet!

Emoji artwork provided by EmojiOne (free licence)
